评论详情: Wore it in public and was complemented a lot! Mine did come with a small hole in the pocket though, so that’s the only reason it’s 4 stars.
Good but runs a tiny bit small also pretty thin
Interesting material for 30$ was expecting a higher quality item. It's very thin and not windbreaker material either. Feels like shein clothes if u know what I mean lol
Purchased as a gift for a young girl who identified it as a want. A little on the lighter side but was what she wanted. It appears sturdy enough so I think it will work for her.
